Too bad I don't live in Korea
I live in NA.  Can I equip the Korean Icon and get the winners' icon when they win?
The way I read it, you have to be playing in the region that wins to get the gilded icon, but can show support to any region you would wish.
Sadly you can't. You can support them, but only the people in Korea will get the winners' icon. Only the people in the winning region get the winners icon. This is different from MSI.
> I believe that EU and NA are facing off so you don't have to worry about Korea dunking NA

So if I'm understanding this correct being from NA I will only get the winner's icon if NA wins in EU vs NA right?

And I won't get the winner's icon if I buy the rift rival icon for another region's match up.

I'm wondering the same thing... like does the system determine who is in the region by the icon bought? Or by another way such as user location. I'd like to buy all the icons; but am unsure if I'd receive the winner's icon if my region wins.
Yeah, so you won't get an icon. At least us EU players will get another icon.

Awww, isn't that cute. An EU player so concerned about Rift Rivals that he has to bolster his petty ego by putting down those "lowly" NA players in their own comments.

Have a nice life, kid.
How does it feel now that EU has lost in an almost embarrassing fashion?
I root for the EU LCS over the NA LCS, despite living in NA. Is there a way for me to get a gilded event icon if the EU LCS wins?
From the way the post reads, only players that play in the region will get the gilded icon, so you would have to be on EU to get it if EU wins.
G2 took a game off of SKT T1 at MSI, I am fairly sure they are ready for this one. But maybe their ego from that can get the best of them.
awkward

Can you somehow make it so that you can actually TELL which icon is for which regions? Cause after you buy the icons, there is no quick and easy way of finding out which icon is which region. They all look the exact same, and I highly doubt any of us actually remembers which colour is for which region. The only way that I know of to check is to go back to this page, or go to your store, checkmark the show owned icons, and look from there.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
yeah... its called looking in purchase history... or like you said, going to this page... these are both the "quick and easy way of finding out which icon is which region"...
